name: Scopa Shoppable Product Tagging
author: Scopa Analytics

sections.description:
Scopa lets you add shoppable product tagging to your website content.

Increase revenue by bringing the efficiencies of shoppable product tagging to your website. Efficiencies like, multiple links on each image! With Scopa you can show interactive tags on your content to drive high-intent traffic to your desired destination, resulting in greater engagement and tailored analytics. For more information on shoppable product tagging please visit our website.

Scopa lets you…

Link Efficiently:

Add multiple links per image

  • Save time with streamlined bulk tagging

  • Boost engagement site wide with higher CTRs

Increase Revenue:

  • Bridge content to products

  • Grow product awareness with tag impressions

  • Upsell with contextual cross-selling

Enhance Analytics:

  • Expedite set up with automated tracking for impressions, clicks and more

  • Replace heatmaps with content-specific and product-specific attribution

  • Build a foundation for content analysis and optimization

Popular applications for Scopa

Shoppable product tagging for Publishers:

  • Grow affiliate revenue with multiple affiliate links per image and higher CTRs

  • Offer premium sponsored content pieces featuring shoppable imagery

  • Increase analytics on measuring partner content engagement

Learn more about shoppable product tagging for publishers and content creators on our website.

Shoppable product tagging for eCommerce:

  • Streamline the customer journey so users can find the products instantly

  • Grow AOV with contextual cross-selling using shoppable product collections

  • Drive more conversions from your blog and editorial content

Learn more about shoppable product tagging for eCommerce on our website.

Start making the most of your content today with Scopa.

Scopa is a SaaS app. You will need to create an account to use our shoppable product tagging and start optimizing your content.

This plugin places the necessary code snippets to integrate Scopa Analytics tags into your WordPress website.

For full term of use on the Scopa Tagging Platform, please read our services’ terms and conditions.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins -> Add New.
  2. Search for Scopa Script.
  3. Install and activate the Scopa Script plugin.

Manual Installation

  1. Download the latest tagged archive.
  2. Go to Plugins -> Add New
  3. Click on Upload Plugin.
  4. Upload the zipped archive directly.
  5. Activate the Scopa Script plugin.
